metadata.title: CVE-2023-25742 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: When importing a SPKI RSA public key as ECDSA P-256, the key would behandled incorrectly causing the tab to crash. This vulnerability affectsFirefox < 110, Thunderbird < 102.8, and Firefox ESR < 102.8.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
